attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am so ashamed of you im scottish but i just want to say you have not got a clue how the poor man gets by we are kept as starvations door and you dont care you help every one else how about helping the unemployed there are no decent jobs out there as you no so get out and let some one who no`s how to run this country get on with it and by the way scotland does not want you either so do us a favour just leave

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
